source_paper.title: QOMIC: quantum optimization for motif identification

is_part_of.label: Quantum Computing Applications for Biodiversity Research - Systematic Review

nanopublications.label: TRRUST - Human Transcriptional Regulatory Network Database
nanopublications.description: A manually curated database of human and mouse transcriptional regulatory networks. Contains 8427 human transcriptional regulatory interactions including 2428 activation, 1581 repression, and 4418 unknown interactions.
nanopublications.nanopub_label: Dataset: TRRUST Human Transcriptional Regulatory Network

nanopublications.label: QOMIC Synthetic Benchmark Networks
nanopublications.description: 1500 synthetic networks generated for benchmarking QOMIC algorithm. Networks vary in size (200-1000 nodes), density (average degree 2-10), and activation ratio (0.2, 0.5, 0.8) across four motif topologies: cascade, FFL, bifan, and biparallel.
nanopublications.note: Available in Supplementary Materials of the paper
